dmca.title: [EV1-C1813661B] Unauthorized Use of WESTERN UNION? Mark(Our reference no. 2.28.41)
dmca.body:
t -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Tuesday, November 14, 2006 7:34 AM Posted To: DMCA Conversation: [EV1-C1813661B] =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?Unauthorized_Use_of_WESTERN_UNION?= =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?=3F_Mark(Our_reference_no._2.28.41)?= Subject: [EV1-C1813661B] =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?Unauthorized_Use_of_WESTERN_UNION?= =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?=3F_Mark(Our_reference_no._2.28.41)?= ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?Unauthorized_Use_of_WESTERN_UNION?= =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?=3F_Mark(Our_reference_no._2.28.41)?= Added by system at Tuesday, Nov 14 2006 10:34 am X-MailFrom: IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Nov 14 10:34:49 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 14 Nov 2006 10:33:55 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 14 Nov 2006 10:33:55 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Gk1EQ-0005Mu-Vk for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 14 Nov 2006 10:33:55 -0600 Received: from [38.100.41.83] (helo=cyveillance.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Gk1EM-000ALP-H7 for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 14 Nov 2006 10:33:50 -0600 Received: from plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com [10.20.1.21]) by plmail3.prod.cyveillance.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 50A25B7523; Tue, 14 Nov 2006 11:32:33 -0500 (EST) Message-ID: <18970326.1181163522025620.JavaMail.cicusr@plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com> Date: Tue, 14 Nov 2006 11:33:45 -0500 (EST) From: IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?Unauthorized_Use_of_WESTERN_UNION?= =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?=3F_Mark(Our_reference_no._2.28.41)?= MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=ANSI_X3.4-1968 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Nov 2006 16:33:55.0457 (UTC) FILETIME=[AD5C9710:01C7080A] MIME element (text/html)

WESTERN UNION HOLDINGS, INC

12500 E. Belford Avenue,

Englewood, CO. 80112 U.S.A

11/14/2006
 

VIA EMAIL at abuse@theplanet.com

Abuse

1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 Dallas TX 75207 US


RE: Unauthorized Use of WESTERN UNION® Marks on http://www.mediclub.md/  (Our reference no. 2.28.41) 


To Whom It May Concern:

This notification and request concern use of the WESTERN UNION service marks on the website at http://www.mediclub.md/ for which you are listed as registrant and/or administrative contact.


Western Union Holdings, Inc. ("Western Union") owns the famous WESTERN UNION family of trademarks and service marks, including the words WESTERN UNION alone or in combination with other wording or the "double bar" logo and design (the "WESTERN UNION Mark(s)"). Since 1856, Western Union, through its predecessors, has used the WESTERN UNION Marks for various communication and financial services all over the world. Worldwide, Western Union owns over 720 U.S. and foreign registrations for the WESTERN UNION Marks and over 150 pending applications for the WESTERN UNION Marks. The WESTERN UNION Marks have achieved substantial fame and good will through Western Union's continuous and extensive use in international commerce.
 
It has been brought to Western Union's attention that the WESTERN UNION Marks are being used on the website at http://www.mediclub.md/, and possibly elsewhere, in connection with sales of pha! rmaceutical substances without prescription. Western Union is concerned that this unauthorized use of the WESTERN UNION Marks will confuse consumers as to whether Western Union somehow is associated with, or approves of, http://www.mediclub.md/ and/or the activities conducted through http://www.mediclub.md/. Because importation, sale, distribution, possession, and use of such substances without proper prescriptions may be criminal offenses, Western Union is especially concerned that such use of the WESTERN UNION Marks may dilute the good will in the Marks. See, e.g., Controlled Substances Import and Export Act, 21 U.S.C. §952 (prohibiting importation and sales of controlled pharmaceutical substances, subject to very specific exceptions).

Western Union understands that you may not previously have been aware that such use of the WESTERN UNION Marks is not authorized and that it may violate U.S. and international trademark laws. Accordingly, this letter is formal notification that Western Union cannot permit such unauthorized use of the WESTERN UNION Marks  and a formal request that such use immediately cease.
 
Please ensure that the WESTERN UNION Marks immediately are removed from the website at http://www.mediclub.md/; that any print, electronic, and other forms of promotional materials containing any form of the WESTERN UNION Marks and/or marks confusingly similar to the WESTERN UNION Marks (including uses in metatags, keywords or other "ad triggers," postURL or forwarding commands, hyperlinks, or any other electronic coding) are withdrawn from publication; and that you refrain from further use of any form of the WES! TERN UNION Marks and/or marks confusingly similar thereto. We stress that the WESTERN UNION Marks include the words "WESTERN UNION" and/or the initials "WU" alone, the WESTERN UNION double-bar logo, and the distinctive WESTERN UNION golden yellow and black trade dress ? as well as any variants, abbreviations, or misspellings of "WESTERN UNION."
 
We shall look forward soon to receiving your written response to our notification and request. Please do not hesitate to contact us with your further questions or concerns.


This notification and request do not prejudice Western Union's rights and remedies related to this matter, which hereby are expressly reserved.
 
Sincerely,
Western Union Holdings, Inc. - Intellectual Property Group
12500 Belford Ave. M21A2
Englewood, Colorado 80112
Fax # 720-332-0219
 
This email is sent by the General Counsel's Office of The Western Union Company and may contain information that is privileged and/or confidential. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately and delete this e-mail and any attachments. Thank you.
